This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswhile returning home from dinner, a friend and i just exited the car and were heading to the apartments when i saw a very bright white object traveling north to south. we were in the location of the outskirts of lakewood (5 min east of bear creek park), when we saw the object. it was a very bright white light; looked about the brightness of an aircraft in landing configuration. it was just over the rooftops of the apartment buildings or 30 degrees above the horizon. looked to be at a low altitude of 3000���, traveling north to south over lakewood, co. we both witnessed the object traveling at a good clip; maybe about 150 knots. when my friend asked what the object was it stopped for less than a second then kept traveling. it performed a few quick squiggles as it traveled, but did not change brightness. it was witnessed for a minute the disappeared. it also seemed to respond to my mental greetings by the squiggles. i have seen many ufo���s in this area since moving here a year ago, and are all about the similar type usually (every two weeks or so). there is a lot of air traffic into the departure\arrival flight path of dia also in this area, but they have not been traveling in the same air routes. a few times they have paced aircraft but not very often.
